comment: Thermodynamics is a hard class and he makes it easy to comprehend. The test are no walk in the park you need to study, and remember what he lectures on cause it will be on the test. The online learning has little quizzes that can help you also. just know that what ever you don't know ask or go to his office he will help you.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--TEST HEAVY

comment: He's a really good teacher, but his tests are difficult. Plus he is very unreasonable about grading, and getting him to change your grade is a nightmare. He hates to admit when he is wrong. You get your tests back for about 3 minutes and he takes them right back up. So figuring out if the was a grading error is very difficult.
Overall, He is a good professor.
